column2: BRIEF-United Rentals Q1 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $2.87 April 18 (Reuters) - United Rentals Inc: * UNITED RENTALS ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS AND NEW $1.25 BILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * Q1 REVENUE $1.734 BILLION VERSUS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.69 BILLION * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.45 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * QTRLY TIME UTILIZATION DECREASED 80 BASIS POINTS YEAR-OVER-YEAR TO 65.2% * SEES 2018 NET RENTAL CAPITAL EXPENDITURES AFTER GROSS PURCHASES OF $1.2 BILLION TO $1.35 BILLION * FY2018 REVENUE VIEW $7.58 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * ON APRIL 17, 2018, COMPANYâ€™S BOARD OF DIRECTORS AUTHORIZED A NEW $1.25 BILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * COMPANY INTENDS TO COMPLETE NEW SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM BY END OF 2019.
